snippet.title: Shining Star Idol Dress Up || Trailer
snippet.description:
Create your dream star with a variety of stylish items!

Link to Shining Star: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.teatime.ShiningStar

Have fun with different clothes to customize, Shining Star brings a relaxing and super aesthetic atmosphere where you can decorate your characters with the most diverse items, from the cutest to the most stylish!

The shining stars are waiting for you to customize them and bring the scenarios to life with various items!

Create unique stories with expressions, scenarios, objects, clothes, animals and even speech bubbles!

Create, save or edit whenever you want and bring your imagination to life with an in-game gallery!

Transform your favorite idol into the most beautiful star of all time and share it with your friends on social media!

Dress up your shining star in your own way, the idols are waiting for you!
